Posts.Content: Have just had my first treatment.  I didn't find it bad but just couldn't relax at all and felt as if my whole body was shaking during the few minutes I was receiving the treatment.  Did anyone else feel like this?  Hopefully tomorrow I will feel better about it.  I think it was the thought of what the machine was doing that scared me the most!
